treatment.description: Flowers: perianth tube 13–17 mm, lobes 22–30 mm; anthers 6–8 mm; staminodia slightly recurved distally, margins 1/4 involute; ovary 9–11 mm; style 12–15 mm. 2n = 40.
treatment.discussion: Subspecies hooveri occurs primarily in the Willamette Valley of Oregon. Documentation of occurrence in northern California is lacking.
